evidence.claim: AWP Healthcare implements HIPAA compliance for its services including data handling and EDI transaction management.
Utilization of AWS for hosting healthcare applications and data storage.
Technologies such as FHIR and HL7 bridge communication within healthcare systems used by AWP Healthcare.
The company supports various EDI transaction sets for healthcare billing and record management.

icp.icp_reason: Company uses X12 for EDI transactions and health tech integrations.
